@Message.ExtendedInfo.Resolution: Wait for some time before retrying the operation. If the issue persists, contact your service provider.

@Message.ExtendedInfo.Message: The request failed due to an internal service error.  The service is still operational.
@Message.ExtendedInfo.Resolution: Resubmit the request.  If the problem persists, consider resetting the service.

error.message: A general error has occurred. See ExtendedInfo for more information
